programme.title: The Monica Lewinsky scandal emerges
programme.short_synopsis: The first evidence of the scandal of Monica Lewinsky's affair with Clinton, mulled over.
programme.medium_synopsis: Tapes emerge alledging that Monica Lewinsky was asked to lie on oath about an affair with the President and Clinton delivers a dazzling state of the Union address.
